Quick Pico de Gallo Salsa Recipe

By Sarah-Jane Gwira
August 24, 2017
I love chips and everything that goes with it. This Pico de Gallo salsa recipe is quick, easy, and delicious. It works well on cheese shell tacos, and it's a family favourite. Try it out and see if you like it!
SHARE
Facebook
F
Twitter
T
Pinterest
P
COMMENTS

AuthorSarah-Jane G.CategoryDips + SaucesDifficultyBeginner

I love chips and everything that goes with it. This Pico de Gallo salsa recipe is quick, easy, and delicious. It works well on cheese shell tacos, and it's a family favourite. Try it out and see if you like it!

Yields1 Serving
Prep Time10 mins

 8 Roma Tomatos
 ½ cup Diced Onions
 1 Diced Jalepeno
 2 tsp Salt
 1 tsp Pepper

1

Wash and roughly chop Roma Tomatoes. Place in a food processor (or blender) and pulse until the texture is how you like it. (I like mine slightly chunky). Place in a bowl.

2

Add salt into tomato mixture. (Salt helps draw water out of the mixture.) Drain excess water.

3

Dice yellow onion. Add to tomatoes.

4

Finely chop Jalapeno. You can add as little or as much as you'd like. Add to the onion - tomato mixture.

5

Add more salt and pepper to your liking.

Ingredients

 8 Roma Tomatos
 ½ cup Diced Onions
 1 Diced Jalepeno
 2 tsp Salt
 1 tsp Pepper

Directions

1

Wash and roughly chop Roma Tomatoes. Place in a food processor (or blender) and pulse until the texture is how you like it. (I like mine slightly chunky). Place in a bowl.

2

Add salt into tomato mixture. (Salt helps draw water out of the mixture.) Drain excess water.

3

Dice yellow onion. Add to tomatoes.

4

Finely chop Jalapeno. You can add as little or as much as you'd like. Add to the onion - tomato mixture.

5

Add more salt and pepper to your liking.
